name: Universal Fuel Oracle
body:
### Introducing Universal Fuel Oracle.
Android app that helps you minimize your fuel expenses by answering **when** and **where** to fuel your car.

![UFO](http://i60.tinypic.com/347w75d.png)

UFO saves you money by helping you take fueling decisions based on various factors:
  * Changing fuel rates
  * Different gas stations rates
  * Fuel tank status
  * Location
  * Route
  * etc

### Key Features
  * Automatic detection of destination
  * Simple alert popups on top of you Navigation application

### Requirements
  * An Android device with GPS support 
  * A simple [OBD II device](http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=nb_sb_ss_i_0_6?url=search-alias%3Dautomotive&field-keywords=obd+ii+scanner&sprefix=obd+ii%2Cautomotive%2C278).
  * Note that Currently only USA fueling stations are supported.

### Download
[Version 1.0](https://github.com/biu-google-fuel/fuel-oracle-android/releases/tag/v1.0) 

### Source code
[View source on GitHub](https://github.com/biu-google-fuel/fuel-oracle-android).
